Description: The following statement contains a magic number: Console.WriteLine(string.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture' "{0:0.0}cm"' distance).PadRight(16));

The following statement contains a magic number: return TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(args                  .SkipWhile(a => a != "-interval")                  .Skip(1)                  .Select(int.Parse)                  .DefaultIfEmpty(100)                  .First());
